Text: JDRF DonationsHello to All First off I would just like to say thank you for your wonderful donation to the cure for Juvenile Diabetes In less than one week you guys helped me to raise over Enrons matching of this will lead to a contribution of almost This along with millions of other charitable donations will hopefully provide the funds necessary to find the cure for diabetes There is nothing better in life than the unity of mankind to aid in the helping of another human being Thanks again and God Bless you all Have wonderful weekends MC Peace and Prosperity Matthew Campbell Executive Support Enron Net Works LLC
